title: How to Watch the 'Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' Reunion
description: Here's when you can catch up with #MomTok.
author: Meara Isenberg
excerpt: Here's when you can catch up with #MomTok.
text: Why You Can Trust CNET Our expert, award-winning staff selects the products we cover and rigorously researches and tests our top picks. If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. When she's not writing, she likes to dote over her cat, sip black coffee and try out new horror movies. How to Watch the 'Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' Reunion When to watch the Mormon Wives reunion special on Hulu Ready for more of Hulu's Mormon Wives? The hit reality show that follows Taylor Frankie Paul, Jen Affleck and more Mormon mom influencers premiered its 10-episode second season on May 15. Now, the cast is assembling for the show's first reunion special.Season 1 of The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives debuted in 2024 and followed a group of Mormon women -- dubbed #MomTok -- in the aftermath of a swinging sex scandal. Former Bachelor and Bachelorette star Nick Viall will host the season 2 reunion, which promises "secrets and scandals, never-before-seen footage, and a surprise announcement," according to Hulu.Hulu renewed The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives for 20 episodes after season 1 -- and viewers have only seen half of them so far. Here's when #MomTok fans can watch the season 2 reunion.Read more: Spectrum TV Select Customers Will Now Get Hulu for FreeWhen to watch the Mormon Wives reunion special on HuluAt this point, you know to report to Hulu to stream The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives. The reunion drops on Tuesday, July 1. If you still need to get the streaming service to watch the special, you can sign up for the ad-supported plan for $10 per month or $100 per year. To stream without ads, you'll need $19 per month version of Hulu. Reality fans with Hulu can also watch a new season of ABC's Bachelor in Paradise in July (it premieres July 7 and streams next day on Hulu). James Martin/CNET If you want Disney Plus, ESPN Plus or Max in addition to Hulu, you have the ability to bundle multiple services and save money. You can pair Hulu with Disney Plus and ESPN Plus, just Disney Plus or Disney Plus and Max. Hulu student discounts and free trials are also available. Other Services & Software
html:
Why You Can Trust CNET

Our expert, award-winning staff selects the products we cover and rigorously researches and tests our top picks. If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Reviews ethics statement

Here's when you can catch up with #MomTok.

Meara covers streaming service news for CNET. She graduated from the University of Texas at Austin with a degree in journalism. When she's not writing, she likes to dote over her cat, sip black coffee and try out new horror movies.

  • How to Watch the 'Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' Reunion
  • When to watch the Mormon Wives reunion special on Hulu

Ready for more of Hulu's Mormon Wives? The hit reality show that follows Taylor Frankie Paul, Jen Affleck and more Mormon mom influencers premiered its 10-episode second season on May 15. Now, the cast is assembling for the show's first reunion special.

Season 1 of The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives debuted in 2024 and followed a group of Mormon women -- dubbed #MomTok -- in the aftermath of a swinging sex scandal. Former Bachelor and Bachelorette star Nick Viall will host the season 2 reunion, which promises "secrets and scandals, never-before-seen footage, and a surprise announcement," according to Hulu.

Hulu renewed The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives for 20 episodes after season 1 -- and viewers have only seen half of them so far. Here's when #MomTok fans can watch the season 2 reunion.

Read more: Spectrum TV Select Customers Will Now Get Hulu for Free

When to watch the Mormon Wives reunion special on Hulu

At this point, you know to report to Hulu to stream The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives. The reunion drops on Tuesday, July 1. 

If you still need to get the streaming service to watch the special, you can sign up for the ad-supported plan for $10 per month or $100 per year. To stream without ads, you'll need $19 per month version of Hulu. Reality fans with Hulu can also watch a new season of ABC's Bachelor in Paradise in July (it premieres July 7 and streams next day on Hulu).

If you want Disney Plus, ESPN Plus or Max in addition to Hulu, you have the ability to bundle multiple services and save money. You can pair Hulu with Disney Plus and ESPN Plus, just Disney Plus or Disney Plus and Max. Hulu student discounts and free trials are also available.

Other Services & Software
